abstract: International Data report estimates Apple shipped 3.6 million units of its Apple Watch in second quarter; says FitBit and other fitness bands may be losing ground to smartwatches.
lead_paragraph: A new report estimates that Apple shipped 3.6 million watches in the last quarter — enough to change the competitive landscape for fitness bands.

headline.main: Apple Watch Shipments Nearly Outpaced Fitbit
headline.print_headline: Apple Watch Shipments Nearly Outpaced Fitbit

snippet: A new report estimates that Apple shipped 3.6 million watches in the last quarter — enough to change the competitive landscape for fitness bands.
